comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: Here is a different photo from the NY Times of the Culver Black Horse Troop, which was to participate in the inauguration of Wilson: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9B0DE1D6163FE6... The Culver Military Academy still exists, it is a college prep boarding school in Indiana: Wikipedia article here: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Culver_Military_Academy The Culver Black Horse Troop still exists and has participated in many inaugurations, here is a link: www.culver.org/index.php?option=com_content&task=view...
